title: nahirE nahi sankaa
sahitya:
nahirE nahi shankA kAcinnahirE nahi shankA
anupallavi

ajamakSaram advaitamanantam dhyAyanti bhrammaparam shAntam
caraNam 1

yE tyajanti bahutara paritApam yE bhajanti sad-chidsukha rUpam
   
caraNam 2

paramahamsa guru phaNitam gItam yE paThanti nigamArthasamEtam
